description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Total musical creativity in the palm of your hands. Over 450 instruments to create musical riffs or choose from over 700 pre-written riffs. 32 tracks each with its own volume, pan, filters and sound fx control. Fine tune your riffs with note volume, pan, attack, release, sample offset and pitch bend. On-screen help is always on view and video tutorials are provided. 5 CoLD SToRAGE demo songs :O)
